response.overview: The film reflects the Moroccan reality, where human values ​​have diminished, and absurdity prevailed in the society that abandoned its principles and inflated the features of opportunism, until we found ourselves in the end «within the era of carrying all the features of mediocrity in all areas, and became the elements of fame and stardom», unlike Earlier phases were politically harsh and freedom of expression was limited, but successes were real and well founded, unlike today. The film presents the character of a statesman who emerges from his long silence to present his views on the different events and issues in Morocco today, in comparison to the image of the statesman between the years of the seventies and eighties and the prestige in which he lived, and the statesman today who no longer enjoys a seed of dignity. Strength is measured by the amount of screaming, far from common sense.
response.title: جوع كلبك

release_dates.note: Festival International du Cinéma Méditerranéen de Tétouan
